name: Prison Chainball Massacre
description:
Prison Chainball Massacre is a fast paced, mindless arcade brawler set in a prison arena where you must fight incoming waves of enemies by using (or abusing) a unique and addictive physics based combat.

HOW TO PLAY:

SWING yourself around while a massive Chainball around your ankle crushes the corrupt prison guards!
LOOT their hard earned money from the ground!
UNLOCK UPGRADES, power ups, and customization for your character!
COMPETE with other players on Steam Leaderboards!

Stop wasting your time reading this and go play the game!
